verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou be <S%H6148>surety<s%> for thy <S%H7453>friend,<s%> if thou hast <S%H8628>stricken<s%> thy <S%H3709>hand<s%> with a <S%H2114>stranger,<s%>
Thou art <S%H3369>snared<s%> with the <S%H561>words<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> thou art <S%H3920>taken<s%> with the <S%H561>words<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

Do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H645>now,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and deliver <S%H5337>thyself,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> thou art <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of thy <S%H7453>friend;<s%> <S%H1980>go,<s%> humble <S%H7511>thyself,<s%> and make <S%H7292>sure<s%> thy <S%H7453>friend.<s%>
Give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H8142>sleep<s%> to thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> nor <S%H8572>slumber<s%> to thine <S%H6079>eyelids.<s%>

Deliver <S%H5337>thyself<s%> as a <S%H6643>roe<s%> from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the hunter, and as a <S%H6833>bird<s%> from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H3353>fowler.<s%>
Go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5244>ant,<s%> thou <S%H6102>sluggard;<s%> <S%H7200>consider<s%> her <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and be wise: <S%H2449><s%>
Which <S%H834><s%> having <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7101>guide,<s%> <S%H7860>overseer,<s%> or <S%H4910>ruler,<s%>
Provideth <S%H3559><s%> her <S%H3899>meat<s%> in the <S%H7019>summer,<s%> and <S%H103>gathereth<s%> her <S%H3978>food<s%> in the <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>
How <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> wilt thou <S%H7901>sleep,<s%> O <S%H6102>sluggard?<s%> <S%H4970>when<s%> wilt thou <S%H6965>arise<s%> out of thy <S%H4480>sleep?<s%> <S%H8142><s%>
Yet a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8572>slumber,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H2264>folding<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> to sleep: <S%H7901><s%>
So shall thy <S%H7389>poverty<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> as one that <S%H1980>traveleth,<s%> and thy <S%H4270>want<s%> as an <S%H4043>armed<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>
A <S%H1100>naughty<s%> <S%H120>person,<s%> a <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H1980>walketh<s%> with a <S%H6143>froward<s%> <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
He <S%H7169>winketh<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> he <S%H4448>speaketh<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> he <S%H3384>teacheth<s%> with his <S%H676>fingers;<s%>
Frowardness <S%H8419><s%> is in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> he <S%H2790>deviseth<s%> <S%H7451>mischief<s%> <S%H3605>continually;<s%> <S%H6256><s%> he <S%H7971>soweth<s%> <S%H4066>discord.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall his <S%H343>calamity<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly;<s%> <S%H6621>suddenly<s%> shall he be <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4832>remedy.<s%>
These <S%H2007><s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> things doth the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8130>hate:<s%> yea, <S%H7651>seven<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto him: <S%H5315><s%>
A <S%H7311>proud<s%> <S%H5869>look,<s%> a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> and <S%H3027>hands<s%> that <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%>
A <S%H3820>heart<s%> that <S%H2790>deviseth<s%> <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H4284>imaginations,<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> that be <S%H4116>swift<s%> in <S%H7323>running<s%> to <S%H7451>mischief,<s%>
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> that <S%H6315>speaketh<s%> <S%H3577>lies,<s%> and he that <S%H7971>soweth<s%> <S%H4090>discord<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> <S%H251>brethren.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> and <S%H5203>forsake<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of thy mother: <S%H517><s%>
Bind <S%H7194><s%> them <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H6029>tie<s%> them <S%H5921>about<s%> thy <S%H1621>neck.<s%>

When thou <S%H1980>goest,<s%> it shall <S%H5148>lead<s%> <S%H853>thee;<s%> when thou <S%H7901>sleepest,<s%> it shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee; and when thou <S%H6974>awakest,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> shall <S%H7878>talk<s%> with thee.

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> is a <S%H5216>lamp;<s%> and the <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H216>light;<s%> and <S%H8433>reproofs<s%> of <S%H4148>instruction<s%> are the <S%H1870>way<s%> of life: <S%H2416><s%>
To <S%H8104>keep<s%> thee from the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4480>woman,<s%> <S%H802><s%> from the <S%H4480>flattery<s%> <S%H2513><s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of a strange <S%H5237>woman.<s%>
Lust <S%H2530><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> after her <S%H3308>beauty<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> let her <S%H3947>take<s%> thee with her <S%H6079>eyelids.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> by <S%H1157>means<s%> of a <S%H2181>whorish<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> a man is brought <S%H5704>to<s%> a <S%H3603>piece<s%> of <S%H3899>bread:<s%> and the <S%H802>adulteress<s%> <S%H376><s%> will <S%H6679>hunt<s%> for the <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H5315>life.<s%>
Can a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2846>take<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in his <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> and his <S%H899>clothes<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H8313>burned?<s%>
Can <S%H518><s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> hot <S%H1513>coals,<s%> and his <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3554>burned?<s%>

So <S%H3651><s%> he that goeth <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife;<s%> <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> her shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5352>innocent.<s%>
Men do <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H936>despise<s%> a <S%H1590>thief,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> he <S%H1589>steal<s%> to <S%H4390>satisfy<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he is <S%H7456>hungry;<s%>
But if he be <S%H4672>found,<s%> he shall <S%H7999>restore<s%> <S%H7659>sevenfold;<s%> he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1952>substance<s%> of his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But whoso committeth <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2638>lacketh<s%> <S%H3820>understanding:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> it <S%H7843>destroyeth<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
A <S%H5061>wound<s%> and <S%H7036>dishonor<s%> shall he <S%H4672>get;<s%> and his <S%H2781>reproach<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be wiped <S%H4229>away.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> is the <S%H2534>rage<s%> of a <S%H1397>man:<s%> therefore he will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2550>spare<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance.<s%>

He will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6440>regard<s%> <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3724>ransom;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will he rest <S%H14>content,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> thou givest <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7810>gifts.<s%>
